nodes.text: The Buraka irstat was a Tarasin irstat.

The Buraka irstat was responsible for protecting the sacred ch'hala tree grove on the planet Cularin. However, the grove was cut down by the Metatheran Cartel and the members of the irstat felt that they were forever shamed by their failure to protect it. During the Clone Wars, the Cartel organized a celebration on the moon Dorumaa and the members of the Buraka irstat believed that by attacking the event, they could gain revenge against the Cartel. The Tarasin Nyronusa released some dangerous creatures on Dorumaa, in the hope that they would attack everyone at the party. However, their plan was thwarted by the heroes of Cularin.
